# UIBlurEffect.Style.systemUltraThinMaterial

**Case**

An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of an ultra-thin material.

## Declaration

```swift
case systemUltraThinMaterial
```

## Adaptable styles

- **UIBlurEffect.Style.systemThinMaterial**: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a thin material.
- **UIBlurEffect.Style.systemMaterial**: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a material with normal thickness.
- **UIBlurEffect.Style.systemThickMaterial**: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a material that’s thicker than normal.
- **UIBlurEffect.Style.systemChromeMaterial**: An adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of the system chrome.
